sources.title: Blood From Stone | Full Movie | Vampire Thriller!
sources.description:
Blood From Stone - Starting over in a new life, Darya struggles to overcome her curse of being turned a vampire by Jure. For Jure, he feels the weight of immortality crushing him and burdened by the realization that others now perceive him as evil when he was once seen as a god among men.
2020.  Stars: Vanja Kapetanovic, Gabriella Toth, Nika Khitrova

metadata.Plot: The old era of vampires has been forced into darkness, yet they are drawn to the dawning of a new era for themselves with a longing to be free of their savage curse.
metadata.Actors: Vanja Kapetanovic, Gabriella Toth, Nika Khitrova
